creator: Best Keyboard Theme Designer
descriptionHtml:
💌Fantasy Butterfly Theme Keyboard💌

👍Install our keyboard with Fantasy Butterfly theme now for free!👍

💋If you are looking for new keyboard themes to personalize your Android device with Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme is going to be perfect for you! Try this keyboard and enjoy the smart typing now! This keyboard theme will make your phone look amazing! Start enjoying this amazing new way to personalize your device! Take the Fantasy Butterfly keyboard and have your splendid experience now!

✅How do I apply for Fantasy Butterfly keyboard theme?✅
• Download Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme from Play Store and open it；
• Click the APPLY button or the preview picture of Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme；
• Bravo! You have installed and applied Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme；
• Press the Finish then enjoy the Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard app.

🔥Want more themes?🔥
Our Keyboard provides amount of free and perfect stylish & fashion keyboard HD wallpapers to decorate your phone background.
We usually update NEW themes five times a week. Please keep your attention on our Store frequently.

⭐️Free and Key Features of Keyboard!⭐️
• Over 150 languages supported.
• Text face(✿◠‿◠)✌.ʕʘ‿ʘʔ.
• Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste；
• Colorful themes: 3000+ Colorful Themes available and DIY your own theme.
• Customizable keyboard color, wallpaper and layout as you like.
• Input thousands of Emojis, Dictionaries, GIFs, Emoticons and stickers anywhere conveniently.
• Contextual Prediction: Most powerful error correction: auto-correct mistyping, spelling errors and capitalization automatically.
• Cloud prediction: Enhance next word prediction and other predictions by cloud computing.

✔️Multi Language Typing？✔️
Our Keyboard which has been loved deeply by over 30 million users support over 150 languages and still counting. (Including but not limited to English, العربية, Hrvatski, Čeština, Nederlands, Français, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, עִברִית, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, Malay, Pilipino, Polskie, Português, Română）

📲Supported devices？📲
Our Keyboard is compatible with almost all android phones. (Including but not limited to Samsung Galaxy Note 10, Note 8, Note 6, Note 5, Samsung Galaxy J7, Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Edge, S9, S9 +；Sony Xperia Z5, Sony Xperia Z4; Huawei P10 and P10 Plus, Huawei Mate 10, Huawei P9, Huawei Honor 8; HTC 10, HTC One A9; OPPO Find 9; OPPO F3 Plus; Xiaomi Mix, Xiaomi 6; Nokia 8; VIVO V5 Plus，Moto, etc.)

🛡Don't worry about privacy and security:🛡

❤️We will never collect your personal info and collect the photos you set as HD wallpapers. We only use the words typed by you to make the predictions more accurate.
Add Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme in your phone! Let Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme show its unique charm, your phone can be really different with Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme. Feeling attractive now? Install Fantasy Butterfly Keyboard Theme and apply it now!
descriptionShort: Install and stylish keyboard with Fantasy Butterfly Theme now!
